item.title: LunaVPN Cancellation Policy
item.description: Last Updated: 2024-01-01 This document outlines the cancellation policy of LunaVPN, a division of RePass Cloud Pty Ltd (‘we’, ‘us’, or ‘our’), and provides guidance on the process for cancelling a subscription to our services (‘Services’).

item.title: LunaVPN Subscription Cancellation Instructions
item.description: Last Updated: 2024-01-01 Detailed Cancellation Instructions Follow these steps to cancel your subscription to LunaVPN, which is managed through Stripe, a secure payment platform.

item.title: WireGuard Setup Instructions
item.description: Last Updated: 2024-01-01 WireGuard Setup Instructions Configure LunaVPN with WireGuardÂ® on your preferred device and operating system for a secure and fast VPN experience.

item.title: 32 Worldwide Locations
item.description: Explore LunaVPN’s extensive network of 32 worldwide locations. Test the speed of our VPN servers hosted on Vultr and experience lightning-fast connections.

item.title: Acceptable Use Policy
item.description: Last updated December 13, 2023 This Acceptable Use Policy (’Policy’) is part of our __________ (’Legal Terms’) and should therefore be read alongside our main Legal Terms: __________.

item.title: Automatic Updates - Android
item.description: You can update your Android apps and the Play Store app one at a time, all together, or automatically.

item.title: Automatic Updates - iOS
item.description: If you’d prefer to manually update all of your apps, turn off automatic updates.

item.title: Downloads
item.description: Download WireGuard Client WireGuardÂ®: LunaVPN’s high-speed, secure VPN protocol. WireGuardÂ® offers simplicity, speed, and advanced encryption.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Have questions? Find answers here! Need assistance with LunaVPN setup on your device?

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on Android
item.description: We're working on something exciting! This page is currently under construction.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on iOS
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Credentials and Locations Install WireGuard on iOS Download Configuration File Load Configuration File Credentials and Locations For any LunaVPN provisioned WireGuard connection, you will need to have a Configuration File downloaded to your mobile device, or be able to scan a QR Code from a computer browser for the VPN Server.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on macOS
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Credentials and Locations Install WireGuard on macOS Download Configuration File Load Configuration File Credentials and Locations For any LunaVPN provisioned WireGuard connection, you will need to have a Configuration File downloaded to your computer.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on Windows
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Credentials and Locations Install WireGuard on Windows Download Configuration File Load Configuration File Credentials and Locations For any LunaVPN provisioned WireGuard connection, you will need to have a Configuration File downloaded to your computer.

item.title: No Logs Policy
item.description: LunaVPN No-Logs Policy At LunaVPN, our primary mission is to ensure your online privacy and security through a VPN service.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This privacy notice for RePass Cloud Pty Ltd (doing business as LunaVPN.

item.title: Thank you for subscribing to LunaVPN!
item.description: A Warm Welcome from LunaVPN! Dear Valued Customer, I’m thrilled to welcome you to the LunaVPN family!

item.title: What Is A VPN?
item.description: A VPN or virutal private network, is a secure tunnel between your device and the internet, designed to shield you from prying eyes, interference, and censorship.
